name: Shinobi (itch)
description:
Pilot the legendary mech Shinobi to protect the nuclear-powered spaceship from the enemy. Every part of mechs can be destroyed separately.

[W / A / S / D / Space / Left Ctrl] to move.

[Left Shift] to dodge.

[Q] to activate stealth mode.

[E] to focus.

[F] to pick up items [BUG - DOESN'T WORK]

[LMB] to shoot bullets.

[RMB] to launch missiles.

[Scroll] to use the sword.

Estimated play time: 5 mins.

Unfinished project and still need more work.
